extendedTable.comment: Notification Messages for the Notifications Plugin

field.name: Enabled
field.comment: The indicator to display whether the message is enabled or not.

field.name: SchoolID
field.comment: The School Number of the school the message will display at. 0 = all schools

field.name: Admin_Portal
field.comment: The indication as to whether the message will display in the admin portal.

field.name: Sub_Portal
field.comment: The indication as to whether the message will display in the substitute portal.

field.name: Teacher_Portal
field.comment: The indication as to whether the message will display in the teacher portal.

field.name: Public_Portal
field.comment: The indication as to whether the message will display in the public portal.

field.name: Start_Date
field.comment: The date the notification will start to display.

field.name: End_Date
field.comment: The date the notification will stop displaying.
